row.Entry_Notes_Comments: Formerly pupils of St. Ephrem, now divided - TAC. Does not seem to be the same as the 7th cent. (?) Simeon of Simosata who wrote biography of Theodotus of Amida (http://www.csc.org.il/db/browse.aspx?db=SB&sL=S&sK=Simeon%20of%20Samosata&sT=keywords).
